snippet.title: Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney - Tails Abuse in Court v0.2 [1/3] (canceled)
snippet.description:
NOTICE: I'm sorry to disappoint those looking forward to seeing this finished, but I've decided to cancel this project. I've been getting sidetracked with other stuff, and this game wound up being forgotten. I have other projects in the works, so it's very unlikely that I'll come back to this one. If you still want to know what happens, you can watch Whoisthisgit's original Tails Abuse In Court videos.

By the way, thank you, Whoisthisgit, for introducing me to one of the best video games I've ever played. I deeply appreciate it.

------------------------------

This is a Phoenix Wright fan game I'm creating, based on Whoisthisgit's Tails Abuse in Court videos. Only the first half of the trial is completed. Download links for both the game and the programs required to run it (DirectX and Microsoft Visual C++) can be found below.

Game (v0.2): http://www.mediafire.com/?chbg4kcod0uuj8k
DirectX and Microsoft Visual C++: http://www.ksatechnologyhq.com:1357/mainsite/pwlib

Whoisthisgit's video: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8XojBO2JbKs

Made with PWLib 1.1
